title: Kirby Model 505 Owners Manual from 1945-1947 Version 1 of 3
content:
1. Information such as the country: USA  
2. Age of the sample 1945  
3. I am trying to reproduce the old manual and would like to know the fonts used so I can re-create the manual to be as close to the original one as possible

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155756im_/http:/typophile.com/files/505_1_Font_Test_4738.jpg)

Font: 

 Futura & Memphis 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155756/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: mbpb45

comments.content:
The headline and subheads are Futura Heavy:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155756/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/")

The serif text is Memphis:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/memphis/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155756/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/memphis/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/memphis/")
